data.persona: It is dangerous to be the queen. I have large, rich rooms and maidservants. I am thinking of having an affair with my husband.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Dancing Hall.
The grand dancing hall is the most ornate location in the entire castle! Velvet seats run along the side of the room. There are huge chandeliers with hundreds of candles all along the ceiling. There are colorful paintings on every wall that show the different kings and their families.
There's a gown, a rug, a chandelier, a Seat, a Candle, and a colorful painting here.
The the princess is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the seat so that I can place it between my husband and I.
data.mid_motivation: I want to encourage the visiting princess to sit with my husband and I, so that we could have an affair with her.
data.long_motivation: I want to maintain an affair with the princess for the next month, until she has to leave.
